books.title: Salmon
books.description: The Salmon is a graphic novel by award-winning cartoon artist Jae-Kwang Park.  The original idea for the graphic novel came from his grandmother's childhood.

books.title: Nemiri Book
books.description: Nicolas very first artwork collection 'Nemiri Book' has been published in 2017.

books.title: OMPHALOS
books.description: OMPHALOS is a compilation of masterful drawings from the sensual imaginings of Kim Jung Gi.
